english_example_sentence: You never sit on old uncomfortable wooden chairs.
russian_example_sentence: Вы никогда не сидите на старых неудобных деревянных стульях.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz asla eski rahatsız ahşap sandalyelerde oturmazsınız.
